name: canshare-who5-indolent-bcell-lymphoma-histology
title: NZ WHO haematolymphoid indolent B cell lymphoma histology (5th edition)
description: Histologies used for indolent B cell lymphoma (WHO Classification of Tumours, Haematolymphoid Tumours, 5th edition) or an 'Other' value.

filter.value: ^394301000210105 |New Zealand World Health Organization classification of tumors 5th edition hematolymphoid indolent B cell lymphoma histology reference set (foundation metadata concept)| OR 74964007 |Other|
